Teacher Name

1.I shall abide by all the provisions of the Lovely Professional University Act, Statutes, Ordinances, Regulations, Rules, Orders, Instructions, Information, Guidelines, Manuals, Code, Circulars etc. in force and as amended from time to time (hereinafter jointly referred to as “the Provisions”) of and/or framed by the Lovely Professional University and Lovely International Trust and their Institutes, Schools, Departments, Divisions, Centers, other constituent units, establishments and facilities including hostels, transportation etc. and concerned authorities, officers, assigns and employees ( hereinafter referred to as “the University”). The University will be at liberty to impose any penalty or any disciplinary action(s) on me being found guilty of, any sort of misconduct or indiscipline or disobedience or malpractice within or outside the precincts of the University, or any act which is detrimental to the interest of the University. The University, in such case, may discontinue my stay in the University and I shall not be entitled for any refund of admission fee, hostel fee, bus fee and any other fee / charges paid to the University and I shall also be liable to pay the pending fee, dues, penalty, etc.

2.I shall avail the transport facility for the full academic session (i.e. Two Semsters ) and if due to any reason I withdraw this facility during the academic session, I shall be liable to pay the fee and other charges for the full academic year.

3.I shall board the transport vehicle from the assigned boarding point/location only and being found of boarding from another route, I shall be liable to face any disciplinary action and/or penalty to be taken against me by the University.

4.I shall carry the transport identity card all the time while boarding the transport vehicle. I understand that the University has the authority to check the transport identity card at any time and if found, I shall be liable to any disciplinary action and/or penalty as may be decided by the University.

5.I am aware that ragging is a criminal offence and is strictly prohibited. I shall not indulge directly or indirectly in any case of ragging in or outside the campus of the University. If I indulge in ragging, the University may take appropriate disciplinary action (including rustication/expulsion from the University)
6.I shall be liable to pay for any damage caused by me to the transport vehicle and/or the property of the University either alone or jointly with others and face disciplinary action.

7.The University shall not be liable for any damage, loss, accident, and/or mishappening, suffered by me, during the transit time. I shall make the required adjustments for my transport facility as per the specific requirements of the University for a specific time due to any reason, whatever it may be.

8.I shall be liable to pay the transport charges/fee for the industrial visits,tours,bridge courses,workshops,practical,training,placement visits or for visiting such other place/events as may be specified by the University from time to time.

9.The University shall be entitled to carry out the inspection of the transport vehicle at any time within or outside the precincts of the University. All type of charges and fee relating to the transport facility are subject to revision by the University from time to time.

10.For any unforeseen issues arising, that is not covered by this Undertaking, or in respect of all the matters, not expressly provided herein, the University may take an appropriate decision that shall be final and binding on all the concerned.

11.I am giving this undertaking with full understanding and state that the information given by me above are true and complete to the best of my knowledge and belief and the certificates, documents and other information submitted by me are genuine and nothing has been concealed / suppressed. I understand that if any of the statements made by me above is found incorrect, I shall be liable to such disciplinary action(s) and/ or penalty as may be decided by the University, notwithstanding legal action under the law of the land. In such case, the hostel fee and other charges deposited by me shall be forfeited.
